2072600.name: Shadows on the Vatican - Act III: Sloth
2072600.description:
Ex-priest James Murphy and the paid assassin named Silvia team up to uncover evidence of a conspiracy overseen by leading figures of the Vatican. From the clues revealed in this dangerously incriminating document, together they investigate the identity of the “Suits,” the ruthless members of a powerful cabal who act in the shadows, influencing pivotal aspects of Italian society. With the help of an old friend and the cheerful bartender Mario, James and Silvia must get to the conspirators before the conspirators get to them.



For James, the time has also come to confront the ghosts of his past that once brought him to his knees, even as a mysterious figure is trying to contact him in the present – someone who may know many secrets about the inscrutable Silvia. During their adventure, the strained relationship between the American doctor and the young mercenary will take unpredictable turns into something neither of them could have ever imagined…



  • "Sloth" is the third act of the point&click adventure series "Shadows on the Vatican," inspired by true events and set entirely in Italy
  • Ongoing plot grows darker and more dangerous as the hunters are also the hunted
  • Explore Rome and visit breathtaking hand-drawn locations in full HD resolution
  • Complete restyling of the graphics, with new 2D models and redesigned animations
  • Traditional puzzles like the adventure classics offer a challenge for every kind of player
  • Control alternates between James and Silvia as playable characters
  • Motion-comics animated video sequences
  • Full English voice-overs (with subtitles in Italian, German, Spanish, French, Russian, Polish and possibly more)
